caption.p: Viability percentages of Tbb bloodstream form treated with 25 nL/mL (in black) or 10 nL/mL (in white) of EO. Mean ± SD calculated in triplicate repeated twice and normalized according to negative control. The IC 50 of the positive control (suramin) in those experiments was 21.53 ± 2.62 ng/mL.
